author: Leigh Beadon
description: At the beginning of the month, we kicked off a fundraising drive to help sustain the independent, uncompromising coverage that we always try to offer at Techdirt. We also decided to try a new experiment that we hope to turn into an annual tradition: offering up a limited edition commemorative coin for our biggest supporters. […]
title: Time Is Running Out To Get The First Techdirt Commemorative Coin By Contributing To Our Fundraiser
